text:
vraqtamEkA# rakShati dEvayUqnAM || 
caqtuqShTOqmO a#BavaqdyA tuqrIyA# yaqj~jasya# paqkShAvRu#ShayOq Bava#ntI | 
gAqyaqtrIM triqShTuBaqM ja#gatImanuqShTuBa#M bRuqhadaqrkaM ~Myu#~jjAqnAH suvaqrA&Ba#ranniqdaM || 
paq~jcaBi#d^^rdhAqtA vi da#dhAviqdaM ~Myat tAsAq(gg)q svasRU#rajanaqyat pa~jca#pa~jca | tAsA#mu yanti prayaqvENaq pa~jcaq nAnA# rUqpANiq krata#vOq vasA#nAH || 
triq(gm)qSath svasA#raq upa#yanti niShkRuqta(gm) sa#mAqnaM kEqtuM pra#timuq~jcamA#nAH | 22
